price: Wͻkaa sε: “Yɛn wura Nyankopͻn, Yɛayε bͻne atia yεn kraa, na sε Wamfa yεn bͻne ankyε yεn na Wanhu yεn mmͻbͻ a, nokorε sε yεbεka brεguofoͻ no ho “.
arabic: قَالَا رَبَّنَا ظَلَمۡنَآ أَنفُسَنَا وَإِن لَّمۡ تَغۡفِرۡ لَنَا وَتَرۡحَمۡنَا لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālā rabbanā ẓalamnā anfusanā wa-in lam taghfir lanā watarḥamnā lanakūnanna mina al-khāsirīna
